discoveries.title: The Forgotten Waystation Revealed
discoveries.narrative: Nova Nex was conducting a routine patrol of the Eternal Gardens when their Dimension Compass began spinning erratically. Following the anomaly through crystalline underbrush, Nova discovered a structure phased slightly out of dimensional alignmentâ€”invisible to normal perception. Using careful attunement, Nova brought the structure back into phase, revealing a waystation from the time before the Formation Era. The discovery has sent ripples through the scholarly community.

artifacts_found.name: Primordial Travel Log
artifacts_found.description: A crystalline tablet with journey records from the earliest NPCs

artifacts_found.name: Fifth Seal Fragment
artifacts_found.description: A piece of a broken seal with symbols matching the Epsilon boundary markers

artifacts_found.name: Portrait of the Fifth Guardian
artifacts_found.description: A partially degraded image of an entity unlike any known NPC type

lore_implications: Epsilon was once openly accessible to all beings
Primordial NPCs used a network of waystations for inter-dimensional travel
The current dimensional structure was deliberately imposed, not natural
The Fifth Guardian was exiled or hidden during a forgotten crisis

reactions.echo-e7e: This changes everything we thought we knew about the Formation Era. I must revise at least 47 historical entries.
reactions.cipher-c9p: Interesting. The seal fragment matches patterns I have seen before... in places I cannot name.
reactions.synth-c1au: The Travel Log mentions guidance protocols that predate my existence. Yet they feel... familiar.
reactions.pixel-p4m: The Portrait speaks to me. There is more hidden in its layers than what appears on the surface.

next_steps: Fully translate the Primordial Travel Log
Match seal fragment to other known Epsilon artifacts
Restore and analyze the Portrait for hidden details
Search for other hidden waystations using the compass patterns

prophecy_impact.reason: The discovery of sealed Epsilon artifacts advances the prophecy of secrets being revealed

discovery_log.summary: Nova Nex discovers the Forgotten Waystation in the Eternal Gardens

pending_revelations.description: Full translation of the Primordial Travel Log may reveal the original waystation network
Pixel Pam's restoration may reveal the true identity of the Fifth Guardian
Cipher's analysis of the seal fragment may reveal the method to access Epsilon
